item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Introduction

Welcome to my blog!

This site was created and powered by the following:

  1. Hugo for static site generation
  2. Manis for the website theme
  3. Github Pages for hosting

Through this blog, I hope to write interesting posts about projects I am working on, self development and life in general.
